description:
NTS Map: 082J15
A 4km Look walk in the forest with one significant up hill section. Going clockwise return is along a valley trail through meadows.

Trail is described in "Short Walks for Inquiring Minds" by Gillaen Daffern
directions:
Start a station Flats Parking on Elbow Falls Trail (Hwy 66)

Trail head is posted "Elbow Valley Trail" A short distance from trailhead is a junction and signpost indicating directions.
title: Diamond T
